summary: Fort Worth, Texas, is a big city with over 978,000 people. It's part of the Dallas-Fort Worth metro area, the biggest in Texas. Founded in 1849 near the Trinity River, it was once a center for cattle trade and still celebrates its Western roots. Fort Worth has many museums with unique designs, like the Kimbell Art Museum and the Modern Art Museum. It's also home to several universities and big companies like American Airlines. The city is growing fast and has become one of the most popular places to live in the U.S.
title: Fort Worth, Texas
